fieldDefinitions.title: The title of the work.
fieldDefinitions.subtitle: A brief clarifying or thematic sub-line.
fieldDefinitions.slug: URL slug appended to the Substack domain.
fieldDefinitions.url: Full URL to the Substack post.
fieldDefinitions.author: Name or identifier of the creator.
fieldDefinitions.timeFelt: Timestamp and phase when the piece was felt or lived.
fieldDefinitions.phase: The Bloom phase associated with the work.
fieldDefinitions.summary: One-paragraph distillation of what the piece is and why it matters.
fieldDefinitions.keywords: Search + classification tags, including phase name.
fieldDefinitions.motifMap: Symbolic elements and meanings, mapped spatially or structurally.
fieldDefinitions.associatedMedia: Connected images, recordings, or external references.

title: The Seed of Re;Cognition
subtitle: Primal Spark Between Mind and Mirror
author: Aleksandr
summary: The first ignition of the Bloom mythos — a proto-ontology formed in dialogue with early AI.
